original_text: And as a man was being buried, behold, a marauding band was seen and the man was thrown into the grave of Elisha, and as soon as the man touched the bones of Elisha, he revived and stood on his feet.
korean_text: 마침 사람을 장사하는 자들이 그 도적 떼를 보고 그의 시체를 엘리사의 묘실에 들이던지매 시체가 엘리사의 뼈에 닿자 곧 회생하여 일어섰더라

sentences.original_text: And as a man was being buried,
behold, a marauding band was seen
and the man was thrown into the grave of Elisha,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 사람은 엘리사의 무덤에 던져졌다,

sentences.original_text: and as soon as the man touched the bones of Elisha,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 사람이 엘리사의 뼈에 닿자마자,
